SELECT hotissue.HISSUE_ID, TO_CHAR(hotissue.reg_dt,'yyyy-mm-dd') as reg_dt, hotissue.HISSUE_TITLE, hotissue.HISSUET_CONT, hotissue.REQ_ID, hotissue.CATEGORY_ID, hotissue.HISSUE_PARENTID, hotissue.HISSUE_LEVEL, member.mem_name as WRITER FROM( select * from member)member, hotissue hotissue WHERE member.mem_id = hotissue.WRITER AND hotissue.HISSUE_ID =#{hissueId}
